title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
description: Datetime values retrieved from a table show a different format in a dynamic text item and a data/text item.
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the format should be consistent in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
EB: After inputting the 'new Date()' as the content for three items, saving, and previewing, the expected result is for the dynamic text item and data/text item to display the same datetime format. However, the actual result is that the dynamic text item has a different format than the data/text item.
SR: Ensure that the datetime values retrieved from the table show the same format in both the dynamic text item and the data/text item.
